item.description:
Boston Traders' Meetup

You are invited to attend the monthly Boston Traders' Meetup meetings.

The format for the monthly meetings is that each person will introduce her- or himself and state the market that he or she trades and perhaps a very brief description of the approach taken. For example, an introduction could be, "Hi, my name is Fred Hampton and I trade forex breakouts during the London session."

From there, the floor is open for people to discuss anything about trading. You may talk about something you learned recently about trading or about an obstacle that you are facing in trading or make a request for resources from other members.

If someone would like to discuss his or her own trading system for 15 minutes, that can be scheduled with Robert "Bob" Todino, the current local group organizer. Bob can be emailed via his meetup page here:

www.meetup.com/BostonTraders/members/3551396/

Part of the purpose of this group is for people to connect with other traders so it's encouraged for people to exchange contact info. If you are an options trader and another options trader talks about a topic that interests you, then feel free to ask the person if she or he would like to exchange contact info.

--------------------

This meeting is located in the Starbucks inside what is called the "Boston Marriott" even though it's located in Kendall Square, Cambridge. The Kendall Square subway stop is a Red Line stop at "Kendall."

This meeting is FREE andrepeats on the 2nd Wednesday of every month.


Â

group.name: Boston Traders Meetup to Teach/Learn Trading Strategies

item.name: Boston Traders' Meetup Group Meeting 2nd Wednesday at 6 PM in Cambridge
